trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Darz deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Darz that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Darz doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: In his youth, Darz was a member of the Xanathar Thieves' Guild in Waterdeep. After serving ten years in prison for his crimes, he cut all ties to the city and moved north to be a campground caretaker.
Ideal: "You can run from your past, but you can't hide from it."
Bond: "I've made a new life in Triboar. I'm not gonna run away this time. "
Flaw: "I have no regrets. I do whatever it takes to survive."

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. Darz carries twenty sling stones.
